Class NineSlicedTexture2D

A 9-sliced Texture2D. It produces a set of source rectangles that slice the Texture2D into 9 slices, which can be used for rendering.

GetRectForIndex(Rectangle, Int32)

Retrieves a Rectangle corresponding to the region of the 9-sliced texture based on the index.

Declaration
public override Rectangle GetRectForIndex(Rectangle rectangle, int index)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Rectangle rectangle

The Rectangle containing the position and scale of the texture.
System.Int32 index

The index of the rectangle to get the slices from. This goes from 0 to 8 for 9 slices.
Returns
Type Description
Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Rectangle

A Rectangle corresponding to the region of the 9-sliced texture.
